title: Monthly retail sales of beer , wine and liquor stores in Canada 2015 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart represents Sales in billion CAD on the Y-axis. And, its value throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
Over the 12 Months, the Sales in billion CAD for 2015 have been declined whereas grew for Month.
Month Aug had the maximum Sales in billion CAD among all 5 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum Sales in billion CAD was observed in Month Dec for 2019.
Among all the Months, 2015 had the highest Sales in billion CAD 184.0 in Month Aug and lowest value 18.0 in Month Jul.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Sales in billion CAD on the Y-axis. And, its value throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
All through the Months, the Sales in billion CAD for 2015 have declined. On the other hand, for Month the Sales in billion CAD have grew.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Sales in billion CAD on the Y-axis. And, its value throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
Over the 12 Months, the Sales in billion CAD for 2015 have been declined whereas grew for Month.
Month Aug had the maximum Sales in billion CAD among all 5 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum Sales in billion CAD was observed in Month Dec for 2019.
Among all the Months, 2015 had the highest Sales in billion CAD 184.0 in Month Aug and lowest value 18.0 in Month Jul.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Sales in billion CAD on the Y-axis. And, how the value changed throughout 12 Months for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019.
Over the 12 Months, the Sales in billion CAD for 2015 have been declined whereas grew for Month.
In Month Aug, 2018 had the highest Sales in billion CAD 202.0 among the 5 groups and in Dec, 2019 had the lowest Sales in billion CAD 0.0.
Among all the Months, 2015 had the highest Sales in billion CAD 184.0 in Month Aug and lowest value 18.0 in Month Jul.
There is a gap of 166.0 between the highest and lowest Sales in billion CAD found for 2015 in Month Aug and Jul.
Among all 5 groups, 2017 had the gap of 175.0 between the maximum and minimum Sales in billion CAD observed in Month Dec and May respectively.

In Month Aug, 2018 had the highest Sales in billion CAD 202.0 among the 5 groups and in Dec, 2019 had the lowest Sales in billion CAD 0.0. The second highest Sales in billion CAD 188.0 was observed for 2018 in Month Aug.
On average, the Month Feb had the highest Sales in billion CAD for all 5 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. Whereas Apr had the lowest average Sales in billion CAD.
